15:26:07","updatedTime":"2020-10-31 15:26:07","title":"The best portable power stations","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-portable-power-station","description":"<ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Portable power stations are ideal for extended camping trips, power outages, and whenever you need a reliable source of power while on-the-go.&#160;</strong></li><li><strong>The best power stations should offer enough capacity to charge devices and small appliances multiple times, hold up in the event of inclement weather, and have a variety of charge ports to be compatible with a range of plugs.</strong></li><li><strong>Our top pick, the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fportable-power%2Fgoal-zero-yeti-3000x-portable-power-station%2Fation%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Goal Zero Yeti 3000X</a>, offers a massive capacity to be able to charge several devices many times over, can power large appliances like a refrigerator or power tools, and comes standard with a variety of charge ports.</strong></li></ul><p>As more electronic devices pervade every aspect of our lives, finding ways to keep them charged and functional wherever we go has become increasingly important. As a result, there are now a dizzying array of portable power stations and high-capacity battery packs on the market, making it easier than ever to never stray too far from a source of power.&#160;<strong style=\"color: #222222;\">&#160;</strong></p><p>Whether you need to keep your electronic devices functioning on a weekend camping trip or are looking for an emergency power supply for use at home, there are dozens of models to choose from. Some power stations are rugged, durable, and built for the outdoors, while others are more refined and sleeker in design. By providing hours of extra juice wherever and whenever you need it, portable power stations are a convenient tool to have at your disposal, particularly in times of unexpected power outages.&#160;<strong style=\"color: #222222;\">&#160;</strong></p><p>As with most tech products, sorting through all of the different portable power stations that are available can be confusing and time consuming. To help you figure out which one best meets your needs, I tested an array of power stations currently available, and narrowed the field to the best worth owning. At the end of this guide, I've also included some helpful tips on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-portable-power-station#how-to-shop-for-a-portable-power-station-6\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">how to shop for a portable power station</a> and what to consider.</p><h2>Here are the best portable power stations:</h2><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Best high-capacity portable power station:</strong> <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fportable-power%2Fgoal-zero-yeti-3000x-portable-power-station%2Fation%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Goal Zero Yeti 3000X</a></li><li><strong>Best mid-sized portable power station:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B083FR3762/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B083FR3762&linkId=c782f80896d08a242c03fec268287d4096d08a242c03fec268287d40\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">EcoFlow Delta 1300</a></li><li><strong>Best small portable power station: <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FAnker-PowerHouse-Compact-400Wh-120000mAh-Portable-Outlet-Generator-Alternative-Rechargeable-Power-Source-Silent-DC-AC-Inverter-12V-Car-AC-USB-Outputs%2F60551337105513371\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Anker PowerHouse</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best budget portable power station:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07FYJVFNK/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B07FYJVFNK&linkId=5828c345d3548fb4960abb7f6a6d4348d3548fb4960abb7f6a6d4348\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Jackery Explorer 160</a></li><li><strong>Best portable power station for travel:</strong> <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fsherpa-power-banks-and-accessories%2Fsherpa-100ac-power-bank%2F-bank%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Goal Zero Sherpa 100AC Power Bank</a></li></ul><p><em>Updated on 10/30/2020 by Kraig Becker: Overhauled the entire guide with brand new picks for each category, updated the intro and the section on how to shop for a portable power station, included new links and updated the formatting throughout.&#160;</em></p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe best portable power station overall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c69e069331a0011bc6739?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Yeti 3000x\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Goal Zero</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>With its large lithium-ion battery, numerous ports, and incredible build quality, the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fportable-power%2Fgoal-zero-yeti-3000x-portable-power-station%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Goal Zero Yeti 3000X</a> is in a class of its own when it comes to portable power stations.&#160;</h3><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Extremely high capacity, can power everything from smartphones on up to home appliances, compatible with solar panels to recharge</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Very heavy and expensive</p><p>One of the true leaders in the design and construction of portable power stations, Goal Zero has been at the forefront of this market for years. That long heritage shows through in all its products, which stand head and shoulders above the competition in terms of build quality, technology, and features. The company's newest model is the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fportable-power%2Fgoal-zero-yeti-3000x-portable-power-station%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Yeti 3000X</a>, which manages to extend that lead even further, particularly amongst power stations in the high-capacity segment.&#160;</p><p>At its core, the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fportable-power%2Fgoal-zero-yeti-3000x-portable-power-station%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Yeti 3000X</a> is powered by a lithium-ion battery pack that offers more than 3000 watt-hours of capacity. That's enough juice to recharge a typical smartphone more than 250 times or a laptop more than 60 times. But this power station is versatile enough to go well beyond just recharging other devices. It also happens to be capable of powering appliances such as a microwave for up to three hours, a mini-refrigerator up to 87 hours, or a full-sized fridge for 55.&#160;</p><p>One of the features that sets the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fportable-power%2Fgoal-zero-yeti-3000x-portable-power-station%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Yeti 3000X</a> apart is Goal Zero's specially designed AC inverter. Capable of providing 2000 watts of power &#8212; with a surge up to 3500 watts &#8212; this component is what gives this power station the ability to run not charge my smartphone, laptop, or camera, but I could use it on appliances, lights, and even to power my TV. Other power stations include AC power outlets that allow these types of devices to be plugged into them, but very few have the battery capacity and power management to keep them running for extended periods of time.&#160;</p><p>In addition to sporting two standard AC power outlets, the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fportable-power%2Fgoal-zero-yeti-3000x-portable-power-station%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Yeti 3000X</a> comes with plenty of other charging ports, too. Goal Zero ships this model with two standard USB-A ports, a USB-C port, and a USB-C PD (Power Delivery) port, which is also capable of charging a laptop or large tablet. It comes with a 12-volt car port and two 12-volt power pole ports, giving it the ability to power just about any kind of device imaginable, including construction tools like drills or saws.&#160;</p><p>The large lithium-ion batteries that give the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fportable-power%2Fgoal-zero-yeti-3000x-portable-power-station%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Yeti 3000X</a> such a high capacity also adds a considerable amount of weight. This power station weighs in at just over 69 pounds, which takes away from its portability to a degree. To counter this added bulk, it comes equipped with wheels, which does make it much easier to maneuver around the garage, backyard, or campsite if you don't mind hauling it in your car.</p><p>Those same high-capacity batteries also require a substantial amount of time to recharge. When plugged into a wall outlet, the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fportable-power%2Fgoal-zero-yeti-3000x-portable-power-station%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Yeti 3000X</a> would often take up to 14 hours to replenish its onboard power supply. Using a solar panel to recharge the power station can help if you have one, though expect the recharge times to fluctuate wildly depending on the size of the panel and the amount of available sunlight.&#160;</p><p>The <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fportable-power%2Fgoal-zero-yeti-3000x-portable-power-station%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Yeti 3000X</a> is built for those who not only need a portable power station with plenty of capacity, but also one that can survive in challenging environments. Built like a tank, this is a model that professionals can turn to when they need power at a job site, although it is equally useful in emergency situations around the home. Best of all, because it isn't powered by gas, it's completely silent and doesn't produce dangerous noxious fumes.&#160;</p>\n\tThe best mid-sized portable power station\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c6c5e69331a0011bc6758?format=jpeg\" alt=\"EcoFlow slide\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">EcoFlow</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Compact and lightweight, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B083FR3762/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B083FR3762&#38;linkId=c782f80896d08a242c03fec268287d40\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">EcoFlow Delta 1300</a> is a feature-packed portable power station that offers plenty of charging ports, including six AC wall outlets.</h3><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Able to power up to 13 devices at once, still portable despite its 31-pound weight, recharges quickly<strong><br /></strong><strong>Cons:</strong> Power can drain rapidly when charging multiple devices</p><p>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B083FR3762/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B083FR3762&#38;linkId=c782f80896d08a242c03fec268287d40\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">EcoFlow Delta 1300</a> is my favorite power station when it comes to charging the most devices at once. All told, it comes equipped with no fewer than 13 individual ports, including two standard USB-A ports, two USB-A quick-charging ports, and a pair of 60-watt USB-C PD ports. Additionally, it features a 12-volt car port and six (yes, <em>six</em>) AC wall outlets, making it easy to keep a large number of gadgets and tools functioning at the same time.&#160;</p><p>Powering the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B083FR3762/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B083FR3762&#38;linkId=c782f80896d08a242c03fec268287d40\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Delta 1300</a> is a 1260 watt-hour battery, which pumps out enough juice to recharge smartphones and tablets dozens of times and extend the life of a laptop by nearly 24 hours. The 1800-watt AC outlets can also power a small refrigerator, an LCD TV, a toaster, and even a hairdryer. That gives this particular battery pack a level of versatility that you won't find in most other mid-range power stations &#8212; and made it a highly useful thing to pack on car camping trips.&#160;</p><p>Considering the size of its battery and the number of ports that it offers, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B083FR3762/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B083FR3762&#38;linkId=c782f80896d08a242c03fec268287d40\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Delta 1300</a> is surprisingly small. Compared to other power stations in this class, it's relatively compact, making it easier to carry around. A pair of integrated heavy-duty handles aid in that process, although its 31-pound weight will still likely give you pause when having to carry it too far.</p><p>One thing to keep in mind when using this power station is that because it can charge up to 13 individual devices at once, the battery occasionally runs out of juice fairly quickly. Thankfully, I didn't really have the need to recharge that many gadgets at once, although it was nice to know I could if needed. Thankfully, to help compensate for a potentially rapid power drain, EcoFlow gives the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B083FR3762/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B083FR3762&#38;linkId=c782f80896d08a242c03fec268287d40\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Delta 1300</a> the ability to recharge itself quite fast. When plugged into a power outlet, it would often regain around 80% of its power in about an hour and would fully recharge in a little more than 90 minutes.&#160;</p><p>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B083FR3762/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B083FR3762&#38;linkId=c782f80896d08a242c03fec268287d40\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Delta 1300</a> is a bit pricier than other models with a similar capacity, though this is due, at least in part, to a large number of charging ports. If you don't need to power 13 devices at once, there are less expensive alternatives available. But if you're looking for the best all-around product, this is the one you'll want.</p>\n\tThe best small portable power station\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c702d6f5b310011724941?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Anker PowerHouse\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Walmart</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Sleek and small yet highly capable, the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FAnker-PowerHouse-Compact-400Wh-120000mAh-Portable-Outlet-Generator-Alternative-Rechargeable-Power-Source-Silent-DC-AC-Inverter-12V-Car-AC-USB-Outputs%2F605513371\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Anker PowerHouse</a> offers a nice blend of features and functionality at a reasonable price point.&#160;</h3><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Small and compact yet still offers a good-sized battery, lightweight for a power station</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>No USB-C ports</p><p>Well-known for its extensive line of battery packs for keeping smartphones charged, Anker also dipped its toe into the portable power station market. The result is the PowerHouse, a model that's well-equipped for those who need on-the-go charging from time to time, as well as a handy back-up system for use at home during a power outage.&#160;</p><p>The <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FAnker-PowerHouse-Compact-400Wh-120000mAh-Portable-Outlet-Generator-Alternative-Rechargeable-Power-Source-Silent-DC-AC-Inverter-12V-Car-AC-USB-Outputs%2F605513371\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">PowerHouse</a> utilizes a 434-watt-hour battery, which is a good size when it comes to straddling the line between capacity and expense. This allows the power station to recharge a smartphone more than 40 times or a laptop as much as 15 times. It's also capable of powering a CPAP machine for several nights in a row, as well as running small appliances such as a mini-refrigerator or outdoor lighting system, for short periods of time.&#160;</p><p>Capable of charging multiple devices as once, the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FAnker-PowerHouse-Compact-400Wh-120000mAh-Portable-Outlet-Generator-Alternative-Rechargeable-Power-Source-Silent-DC-AC-Inverter-12V-Car-AC-USB-Outputs%2F605513371\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">PowerHouse</a> features four USB-A ports, a 12-volt car port, and a 120-watt AC outlet. That is certainly enough power plugs to accommodate most situations, but the lack of USB-C ports is somewhat limiting. With more and more devices switching to the USB-C format, it's a shame this device doesn't have at least one or two.</p><p>With an aesthetic that somewhat resembles a kitchen appliance, the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FAnker-PowerHouse-Compact-400Wh-120000mAh-Portable-Outlet-Generator-Alternative-Rechargeable-Power-Source-Silent-DC-AC-Inverter-12V-Car-AC-USB-Outputs%2F605513371\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">PowerHouse</a> has a clean, utilitarian design. This allows it to remain fairly inconspicuous when used around the house, although it remains durable enough to survive in the outdoors, too. Its built-in handle and 9.2-pound weight make it easy to carry, striking a good balance between durability and portability.&#160;</p><p>If you're looking for a solidly built power station that combines good battery life, plenty of ports, and an approachable price, Anker has you covered with the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FAnker-PowerHouse-Compact-400Wh-120000mAh-Portable-Outlet-Generator-Alternative-Rechargeable-Power-Source-Silent-DC-AC-Inverter-12V-Car-AC-USB-Outputs%2F605513371\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">PowerHouse</a>. Its size and capacity make it a good all-around choice for most people who don't have the need to run power tools at a job site or be away from a source of power for days at a time.&#160;</p>\n\tThe best budget portable power station\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c725369331a0011bc6782?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Jackery power station\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Small, lightweight, and affordable, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07FYJVFNK/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07FYJVFNK&#38;linkId=5828c345d3548fb4960abb7f6a6d4348\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Jackery Explorer 160</a> is a great option for those looking for a power station on a budget, without having to make too many compromises.&#160;</h3><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Highly portable, can charge up to four devices at once, recharges quickly</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>More of a companion power charger than something to be relied on solely</p><p>If you're looking for a high-quality portable power station, without spending a lot of money, it's tough to beat the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07FYJVFNK/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07FYJVFNK&#38;linkId=5828c345d3548fb4960abb7f6a6d4348\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Jackery Explorer 160</a>. It offers a nice blend of features &#8212; including a built-in LCD screen for monitoring its use &#8212; in a package that's easy to transport. While it may not have a high-capacity battery or an over-abundance of charging ports, its $150 price tag more than makes up for those discrepancies.</p><p>Equipped with 167 watt-hour battery, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07FYJVFNK/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07FYJVFNK&#38;linkId=5828c345d3548fb4960abb7f6a6d4348\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Explorer 160</a> recharges an iPhone more than ten times or a large tablet as many as five. It even did well to extend the life of a laptop and power a digital camera and Bluetooth speaker. However, it isn't capable of running anything with a power draw of more than 100 watts, ruling out television sets, mini-fridges, and CPAP machines.&#160;</p><p>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07FYJVFNK/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07FYJVFNK&#38;linkId=5828c345d3548fb4960abb7f6a6d4348\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Explorer 160</a> won't overwhelm you with a large number of charging ports either, although it certainly has enough to get the job done. It features two USB-A ports, one USB-C port, and an AC wall outlet. This gives it the ability to charge up to four gadgets at once, which is decent considering its price point. That said, considering how widespread USB-C is becoming, I'd have liked to see another of those ports included.&#160;</p><p>Thanks to its low-capacity battery, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07FYJVFNK/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07FYJVFNK&#38;linkId=5828c345d3548fb4960abb7f6a6d4348\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Explorer 160</a> recharges very quickly, requiring just five hours to go from empty to completely filled. As an added plus, the power station can be charged via AC outlet,12-volt car port, or via solar panel. And while there may be times when you wish it had just a bit more capacity, its ease of charging mostly makes this a nonissue.&#160;</p><p>Other than its affordable price, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07FYJVFNK/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_081718_best-portable-power-station-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07FYJVFNK&#38;linkId=5828c345d3548fb4960abb7f6a6d4348\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Explorer 160</a>'s best feature is its size. It's extremely small and easy to carry, tipping the scales at just 3.8 pounds. This makes it a great choice for use around the house, while camping, or anywhere else you might need a bit of portable power. Its built-in handle makes it a breeze to take it along with you wherever you go, ensuring you always have an ample supply of energy to keep your gadgets running.&#160;</p>\n\tThe best portable power station for travel\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c73e169331a0011bc678d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Goal Zero sherpa\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Goal Zero</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>With its surprisingly large battery pack, an array of charging options, and rugged construction, the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fsherpa-power-banks-and-accessories%2Fsherpa-100ac-power-bank%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sherpa 100AC</a> is a portable power station designed specifically with frequent travelers in mind.&#160;</h3><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Perfect for travelers, multiple charge ports plus it supports wireless charging, highly portable</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Expensive, capacity can be an issue if it's the only battery/power source you rely on</p><p>When it comes to choosing the gear that they carry with them on the road frequent travelers, backpackers, and professional nomads are always looking to strike a balance between size, weight, and functionality. Fortunately for them, Goal Zero built a portable power solution that fits that criteria nicely, combining a sizable battery with a good number of ports in a rugged package built to survive just about anything.&#160;</p><p>The <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fsherpa-power-banks-and-accessories%2Fsherpa-100ac-power-bank%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sherpa 100AC</a> features a 94.7 watt-hour battery pack, which translates to 25,600 mAh. That's the highest capacity battery you're allowed to carry onto a flight, with enough juice to recharge a smartphone roughly 8 times or a laptop twice. Compared to other portable power stations that may not seem like a lot, but when you realize that this one can easily slip into a backpack, it's easy to realize its value.&#160;</p><p>Despite the fact it's relatively small and easy to carry, the <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fsherpa-power-banks-and-accessories%2Fsherpa-100ac-power-bank%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sherpa 100AC</a> does have enough charging options to keep you functioning for an extended period of time. The line-up includes dual USB-A ports, as well as two 60-watt USB-C Power Delivery ports, which are bi-directional so they can be used to recharge the Sherpa, too.</p><p>Additionally, Goal Zero managed to squeeze in a small AC inverter for plugging in larger devices and the top of the battery pack has an integrated Qi wireless charging pad. If your phone supports wireless charging, you can simply place it on top of the battery pack, freeing up one of the ports for another device.&#160;</p><p>Additional features include a built-in OLED display for monitoring power usage and a special port for recharging the Sherpa via a solar panel. Keeping with the travel theme, Goal Zero also ships the power bank with four different charging cables, providing everything you need to say powered up on the road.&#160;</p><p>The <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goalzero.com%2Fshop%2Fsherpa-power-banks-and-accessories%2Fsherpa-100ac-power-bank%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sherpa AC100</a>'s main limiting factor is the size of its battery, which is on the small side if you plan to use it to recharge a laptop or other high-capacity devices on a regular basis. It also happens to be fairly expensive compared to battery packs with a similar capacity from other manufacturers. But where Goal Zero separates itself is with the exceptional build-quality and the components used the Sherpa's construction.</p><p>This is a power bank that feels like it could be run over by a car and keep functioning. However, this level of durability <em>does</em> result in a weight of about two pounds. That's quite svelte for a power station but on the hefty side for a power bank. If you don't mind the extra bulk, you'll get a power supply that's above and beyond anything else in its class.&#160;</p>\n\tHow to shop for a portable power station\n\t\n\t<p>When shopping for a portable power station, there are a number of factors to consider. First and foremost is the amount of power it can store, which is typically measured in watt-hours. The higher the number of watt-hours, the more energy you'll have at your disposal. For instance, a power station with a capacity of 150-watt hours can recharge a smartphone roughly 10 to 12 times. Meanwhile, a 1500 watt-hour battery pack will provide more than 120 recharges. <strong style=\"color: #222222;\">&#160;</strong></p><p>That said, in order to achieve a higher number of watt-hours, more power cells are required. That translates to a larger and heavier power station which reduces its level of portability. It also means that it takes significantly longer to recharge the battery pack, whether from a wall outlet or a solar panel. <strong style=\"color: #222222;\">&#160;</strong></p><p>The next thing you'll want to look for in a power station is the number &#8212; and type &#8212; of charging ports the power station offers. Not only will you want enough ports to accommodate all your devices, but you'll want a variety of ports, too. That includes USB-A, USB-C, and at least one AC wall outlet. Another common port is 12-volt power ports, like the so-called cigarette lighter outlets found in your car.</p><p>Many models come with built-in LCD screens that display the current power level, as well as how that power is being allocated to the various devices plugged into the charging ports. Some also offer a specialized port for connecting the power station to a solar panel, providing an alternative method of recharging while in the field. Others come equipped with built-in lights, which is an especially nice feature to have during an emergency situation.&#160;</p>\n\tCheck out our guide to the best battery packs you can buy\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5b76fb345c5e523a1e8b465f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Anker PowerCore 15600 \" height=\"1200\" width=\"1600\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-battery-packs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best battery packs you can 66@2020_2/2020/10/31/07-26-35-832_87178a0f4166181c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1604129167122},{"createdTime":"2020-10-31 15:26:07","updatedTime":"2020-10-31 15:26:07","title":"COVID-19 means US Air Force bombers flying around the world are operating in a 'degraded' environment","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/covid-19-means-a-degraded-environment-for-air-force-bombers-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c4d8969331a0011bc663a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Air Force B-52 bomber\" height=\"1079\" width=\"2158\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A US Air Force B-52 after aerial refueling over the North Sea during a Bomber Task Force Europe mission, September 25, 2020.\n<p class=\"copyright\">US Air Force/Airman 1st Class Jessi Monte</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Even with the ongoing coronavirus pandemic, the Air Force's bombers are still flying around the world to reassure allies and caution rivals.</li>\n<li>For six B-52s and their aircrews who recently deployed to Europe, pandemic-related restrictions meant they faced a \"contested, degraded environment,\" the mission's commander told Insider.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>North America and Europe continue to struggle with the spread of COVID-19, which has affected military operations on both continents. For US Air Force bomber crews, who are still flying missions around the world, the pandemic is a challenge that they just have to work around.</p><p>This spring, Air Force leaders <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/air-force-is-deciding-which-missions-to-drop-during-coronavirus-2020-4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">reviewed their mission-critical tasks</a> to see which could be paused. Air Force bombers have continued their operations in Europe and the Indo-Pacific region, where they're part of a broader effort by the US military to reassure allies and send a message to rivals — Russia and China, specifically.</p><p>Those bomber missions are being conducted in a \"<a href=\"https://www.dvidshub.net/video/767841/btf-europe-commander\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">contested, degraded environment</a>,\" according to Lt. Col. Michael Middents, who commanded a Bomber Task Force mission in Europe from late August to late September.</p><p>\"I emphasize the degraded part of that,\" Middents told Insider in an interview this month. \"If it was a regular day — no COVID, no concerns — you're walking around in your normal patterns.\"</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c4d7d6f5b310011724814?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Air Force bomber aircrew\" height=\"1875\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Airmen from the 5th Bomb Wing at Minot Air Force Base in North Dakota board a jet to deploy to RAF Fairford for a Bomber Task Force Europe mission, August 24, 2020.\n<p class=\"copyright\">US Air Force/Airman 1st Class Josh W. Strickland</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>About one-third of US military installations are still under travel restrictions related to the pandemic; <a href=\"https://media.defense.gov/2020/Oct/30/2002526698/-1/-1/0/COVID_19_TRAVEL_RESTRICTIONS_INSTALLATION_STATUS_UPDATE_OCT_30_2020.PDF?source=GovDelivery\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">those 81 bases</a> are adhering to local health guidelines and have to have a 14-day decline in symptoms and cases before reopening.</p><p>Travel restrictions have been lifted at Minot Air Force Base in North Dakota, the home of the six B-52 bombers from the 5th Bomb Wing that Middents led to Europe, but remain in place at other major facilities, including <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/air-force-assessing-ellsworth-dyess-bases-for-b-21-raider-2020-3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Ellsworth Air Force Base</a> in South Dakota, Ramstein Air Base in Germany, and several air bases in Japan.</p><p>The B-52s, operating from RAF Fairford in southern England, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/air-force-bombers-competing-every-day-over-europe-officer-says-2020-9\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">flew all over the continent</a>, from the Arctic to the Mediterranean and as far east as the Black Sea, where they had what the Air Force deemed an \"unsafe and unprofessional\" encounter with Russian fighter jets.</p><p>\"The thing about COVID is we're still learning quite a bit about it day to day,\" Middents said. \"The policies that we try and make between host nation, the US, and even internally within the Department of Defense ... the challenge that we have is to try and make sure that we are in compliance with those policies while also getting the mission done.\"</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c4d7a6f5b310011724813?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Air Force B-52 engine crew chief\" height=\"1626\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A B-52H crew chief surveys an engine during start-up at RAF Fairford during a Bomber Task Force Europe mission, September 10, 2020.\n<p class=\"copyright\">US Air Force/Master Sgt. Burt Traynor</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>That challenge \"means that we can't always stick to the same timelines, the same procedures. We need to figure out how to plan a little bit differently,\" Middents added.</p><p>Precautions in place across the Air Force include standard good practices, like wearing masks and washing hands, but the need to social-distance and, at times, isolate means changes for what bomber crews can do and where they can go.</p><p>\"We try not to congregate the entire squadron all at one place at one time,\" Gen. Charles Brown, the Air Force chief of staff, told Insider at a media roundtable during the Air Force Associate Conference in September.</p><p>\"We were doing blue- and silver-type teaming really across the Air Force so we could ... ensure that we had the capability to generate air power, and if someone got sick that we ... didn't wipe out an entire unit,\" Brown said.</p><p>Restrictions are also in place for deployed bomber crews and support personnel. \"You don't get a chance to go downtown. You're pretty much stuck on base, and so that's a key aspect,\" Brown added.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c4d7d69331a0011bc6638?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Air Force B-52 bomber pilot refueling\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A US Air Force B-52H pilot during aerial refueling over the Mediterranean Sea on a Bomber Task Force Europe mission, September 16, 2020.\n<p class=\"copyright\">US Air Force/Senior Airman Jennifer Zima</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Middents said the bombers deployed to Europe were operated by \"hard crews,\" which meant that rather than mixing flight crews, the pilots, navigators, and weapons officers assigned to each bomber remained the same.</p><p>\"In doing that, I have a little bit less flexibility on how I can put crews together, but then I mitigate the exposure to any viruses out there,\" Middents told Insider. \"If one crew goes down with COVID for 10 days, then I can keep another crew flying and healthy and safe. The entire squadron doesn't get infected.\"</p><p>There were positive cases within the task force while it was deployed to Europe, Middents said, but they were able to isolate and still contribute.</p><p>\"Of those that were exposed or that tested positive, they went into a restriction of movement and actually for the most part were able to support the mission from their rooms in different capacities,\" Middents said.</p><p>\"They connected on their laptops\" or by phone, Middents added. \"Some of the office duties that we normally do, they were able to do, for those that were up to it.\"</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/covid-19-means-a-degraded-environment-for-air-force-bombers-2020-10'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/xajgPlpNID0\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 30 Oct 2020 19:16:37 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f9c56936f5b310011724862?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"3b0fd34f67cf5c4dd0d2fba12c8a630f","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn69@2020_1/2020/10/31/07-26-36-375_494ba95a3c17a48b.webp","destWidth":1851,"destHeight":1388,"sourceBytes":111316,"destBytes":111316,"author":"insider@insider.com (Christopher Woody)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f9c4d8969331a0011bc663a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn95@2020_6/2020/10/31/07-26-34-594_bd99c781cdd20da7.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f9c4d7d6f5b310011724814?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn59@2020_2/2020/10/31/07-26-26-122_a92d8b19f9919502.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f9c4d7a6f5b310011724813?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn40@2020_6/2020/10/31/07-26-29-413_0e8db1ebcf8fecfe.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f9c4d7d69331a0011bc6638?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn100@2020_2/2020/10/31/07-26-29-173_5fba8d008c4b1142.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn81@2020_6/2020/10/31/07-26-35-995_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn91@2020_4/2020/10/31/07-26-31-488_2d3dec67b61ab112.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn51@2020_5/2020/10/31/07-26-29-699_7fd49138ac92c7d3.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn84@2020_1/2020/10/31/07-26-32-089_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=xajgPlpNID0:Id7PMU-_ngk:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn85@2020_1/2020/10/31/07-26-37-431_252a626989dac263.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/xajgPlpNID0":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn47@2020_5/2020/10/31/07-26-38-544_67b9f7ad47b9c3af.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1604129167100},{"createdTime":"2020-10-31 15:26:07","updatedTime":"2020-10-31 15:26:07","title":"Riot Glass, salt plows, and guns: How corporate America is getting ready for potential civil unrest after the election","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/corporate-america-getting-ready-for-unrest-after-election-day-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c53ec6f5b310011724859?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Boarded up stores\" height=\"1666\" width=\"2223\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Stores boarded up amid unrest in the US over the summer.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Joan Slatkin/Education Images/Universal Images Group/Getty</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Retailers are spending tens of thousands of dollars as they prepare for potential civil unrest following Election Day.</li>\n<li>Entire shopping districts in some cities will be closed, while some retailers take extreme measures such as positioning snow plows to control pedestrian access or installing unbreakable window glass.</li>\n<li>Walmart this week removed firearms from its sales floors due to \"civil unrest\" after protests broke out in Philadelphia following the death of Walter Wallace Jr. The company quickly said the products would be back on the floors a day later.&#160;</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Retail's favorite holiday, Black Friday, is just around the corner, but before they can welcome eager holiday shoppers, stores will have to survive Election Day.</p><p>An already contentious campaign season is projected to result in an unprecedented election, and retailers across the country are gearing up for another round of civil unrest in the aftermath.&#160;</p><p>Protests in the wake of George Floyd's killing in May saw over $1 billion in damages over a 13-day period from May 26 to June 8, <a href=\"https://www.axios.com/riots-cost-property-damage-276c9bcc-a455-4067-b06a-66f9db4cea9c.html\">Axios</a> reported, the costliest in insurance history.&#160;</p><p>Activist groups across the country are already planning potential protests and demonstrations for after Election Day, anticipating foul play at the polls or in the ballot counting room. In Philadelphia, progressive groups are banding together to ensure a fair election process, and will stage protests if there appears to be any foul play, <a href=\"https://www.inquirer.com/politics/election/philadelphia-election-progressive-activists-working-families-party-philly-we-rise-20201022.html\">The Philadelphia Inquirer</a> reported.</p><p>The stakes are high, as the winner of the election will set the course for the US' recovery from the coronavirus pandemic and guide the country's reopening, as <a href=\"https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/empsit.pdf\">12.6 million Americans remain unemployed</a>.</p><p>An influx of mail-in ballots this election cycle will likely delay the announcement of a winner on election night. That departure from Election Day norms is also setting up the country for uncertainty in the days following as the prospect of a contest election lingers and both parties prepare for a 2000-esque showdown to declare a winner.</p><h2>How retailers are preparing</h2><p>Already reeling from the effects of the pandemic combined with a summer of nationwide protests curtailing business, retailers are once again preparing for the worst as the country heads to the polls.</p><p>As <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-10-30/shuttered-rodeo-drive-shows-retail-industry-s-election-day-worry?sref=p7zS9UoY\">Bloomberg</a> reported, the famed Rodeo Drive in Beverly Hills, Calif., is going dark, and the entire street won't be accessible to pedestrian or vehicle traffic. Shopping districts in other major cities are staying open but implementing plans in case protesters resort to violence, looting, or vandalism.&#160;</p><p>Chicago's Magnificent Mile along Michigan Avenue will be armed with \"everything from snow plows to salt trucks\" to control crowds, Rich Gamble, chairman of the Magnificent Mile Association, told <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-10-30/shuttered-rodeo-drive-shows-retail-industry-s-election-day-worry?sref=p7zS9UoY\">Bloomberg</a>.&#160;</p><p>Some stores are building fortifications as they prepare for the election and spending in the tens of thousands to do so. One industry's misfortune is another's time to shine as ServiceChannel, a broker of sorts for commercial construction work, has seen $20 million in invoices come across its platform for civil unrest claims, CEO Tom Buiocchi told <a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/pamdanziger/2020/10/11/retailers-prepare-for-election-day--and-a-possible-new-wave-of-protests/?sh=7ae9cd3f6c0c\">Forbes</a>.&#160;&#160;</p><p>Boarding up a storefront to withstand vandalism can cost up to $31,000, depending on the structure, <a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/pamdanziger/2020/10/11/retailers-prepare-for-election-day--and-a-possible-new-wave-of-protests/?sh=7ae9cd3f6c0c\">Forbes</a> reported. Unbreakable window glass, as <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-10-30/shuttered-rodeo-drive-shows-retail-industry-s-election-day-worry?sref=p7zS9UoY\">Bloomberg</a> reported, is also in high demand with manufacturer Riot Glass turning away new clients to accommodate existing ones, according to CEO Brad Campbell.</p><p>That's why some businesses are picking and choosing which locations they'll protect, with flagship stores taking the highest priority for most.&#160;</p><p>The extent and duration of the unrest are still unknown as the country hasn't settled on a set end date for ballot counting and both sides will be angling for their candidate. In Portland, Ore., shops downtown are still boarded up as protests have continued for months.&#160;</p><h2>Walmart won't be pulling guns from its shelves, after all</h2><p>Walmart reversed a decision to remove firearms from its sales floors amid civil unrest less than one day after the policy was implemented, as <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/walmart-returns-guns-and-ammo-to-store-floors-2020-10\">Business Insider's Mary Meisenzahl reported</a>. The <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/walmart-removing-guns-ammo-from-shelves-displays-2020-10\">original announcement Thursday</a> to remove the weapons from stores followed the looting of a Philadelphia Walmart after protests in the city turned violent. The protests began after the death of Walter Wallace Jr., a 27-year-old Black man who police shot multiple times after responding to a call about a man with a knife.&#160;</p><p>Following the initial announcement, a Walmart spokesperson in a statement to Business Insider cited previous instances of civil unrest in justifying the policy change. Walmart had previously pulled guns from its shelves over the summer as protests gripped the nation following the police killing of George Floyd.</p><p>Walmart sells firearms in around 2,350 stores nationwide, and those seeking to purchase one could still do so under the new policy. Stores would shift to an on-request system, Meisenzahl reported, instead of displaying the merchandise on the sales floor.</p><p>In its statement quickly reversing the policy, Walmart cited the \"geographically isolated\" nature of the unrest.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/corporate-america-getting-ready-for-unrest-after-election-day-2020-10'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/vo69ffn2mq8\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 30 Oct 2020 21:24:55 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f9c53ec6f5b310011724859?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"4968427da91441178e57a30b6b82fe1a","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn19@2020_3/2020/10/31/07-26-07-490_a4d979e323b2c78d.webp","destWidth":2223,"destHeight":1666,"sourceBytes":202852,"destBytes":202852,"author":"tpallini@businessinsider.com (Thomas Pallini)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f9c53ec6f5b310011724859?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn19@2020_3/2020/10/31/07-26-07-490_a4d979e323b2c78d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn81@2020_6/2020/10/31/07-26-35-995_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn8@2020_5/2020/10/31/07-26-28-503_f6360cf0a56eb1f0.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn56@2020_4/2020/10/31/07-26-31-976_9e6775a700156218.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn84@2020_1/2020/10/31/07-26-32-089_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=vo69ffn2mq8:ri-ggRAeLAg:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn74@2020_3/2020/10/31/07-26-38-957_79680e90178ce957.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/vo69ffn2mq8":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn12@2020_6/2020/10/31/07-26-38-396_b76c930ab2e22e0e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1604129167128},{"createdTime":"2020-10-31 15:26:07","updatedTime":"2020-10-31 15:26:07","title":"Texas Democrat Gina Ortiz Jones could become the first Filipina-American elected to Congress","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/gina-ortiz-jones-texas-23rd-district-house-congressional-election-interview-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f97bd3bf21803001222c207?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Gina-Ortiz-Jones\" height=\"1454\" width=\"2180\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Gina Ortiz Jones is the Democratic nominee for Texas&#39; 23rd Congressional district.\n<p class=\"copyright\">AP Photo/Eric Gay, File</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Gina Ortiz Jones is the Democratic nominee for Texas' 23rd Congressional District, an expansive border district that is politically competitive.</li>\n<li>Jones first ran for the seat in 2018 and narrowly lost to Rep. Will Hurd, who is retiring at the end of his term.</li>\n<li>Healthcare is the biggest issue that Jones hears about from voters, especially rural residents.</li>\n<li>\"There are 29 counties in this district, and 18 counties have three or less doctors,\" she told Insider.</li>\n<li>\"There are three counties that have no doctors. It's so important that we invest in the pipeline of talent into rural healthcare.\"</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>For Gina Ortiz Jones, the second time might be the charm.</p><p>Just two years ago, Jones, a Democratic candidate running in Texas' 23rd Congressional District, nearly defeated GOP Representative Will Hurd, falling short by only 926 votes out of nearly 206,000 votes cast. The initial results were so close that Jones <a href=\"https://www.mysanantonio.com/news/local/politics/article/Ortiz-Jones-attends-freshman-orientation-in-13392058.php\">even attended the House freshman orientation</a> for new members when the final tally was still in doubt days after the election.&#160;</p><p>In May 2019, Jones announced that she would run for the seat again. Three months later, Hurd decided to retire from the House at the end of his term.</p><p>Jones, a Iraq War veteran and former Air Force intelligence officer, suddenly became the nominal frontrunner in the sprawling, majority Hispanic border district that stretches from San Antonio, where she grew up, to the Rio Grande and the outskirts of El Paso. In 2016, then-Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton won the district by 4% and then-Representative Beto O'Rourke carried it by 5% in his 2018 Senate race.</p><p>However, the race is still expected to be highly competitive. Hurd always won the district by narrow margins, and Jones faces a new Republican opponent in Tony Gonzales, a conservative Navy veteran.</p><p>When Jones has traveled throughout the district, she said that healthcare is the defining issue for voters, especially in the vast rural regions.</p><p>\"There are 29 counties in this district, and 18 counties have three or less doctors,\" she told Business Insider in a recent interview. \"There are three counties that have no doctors. It's so important that we invest in the pipeline of talent into rural healthcare.\"</p><p>If elected, Jones would be the first Filipina-American in the House and the first openly gay representative from Texas to serve in Congress.</p><p>Below are edited excerpts from Jones' interview with Business Insider.</p><p><strong>Q. </strong><strong>During the final presidential debate, Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden said that he wanted immigration reform passed within his first 100 days. What would your ideal plan look?</strong></p><p><strong>A.</strong> I'm a proud first-generation American. I fully support a clean DREAM Act. [The act allows for conditional residency for qualifying immigrants who came to the US as minors and creates a pathway to citizenship if several requirements are fulfilled.] I live right down the street from the University of Texas at San Antonio, which has one of the largest student \"Dreamer\" populations in the entire country, and we should keep the promise that we made to these young people who are American in every sense of the word. They are our frontline workers, military officers, and teachers. I appreciate the vice president's commitment to immigration reform and that absolutely includes a path to citizenship.</p><p><strong>How would you tackle the issue of border security?</strong></p><p>This is a district that includes 800 miles of the US-Mexico border. I do not support a border wall. When I speak to leaders in our border communities, they do not want a border wall. They very much want infrastructure that helps strengthen those communities given the economic, social, and cultural ties between cities on this side of the border as well as cities on the Mexican side of the border.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9affc269331a0011bc61c2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Big-Bend2\" height=\"3648\" width=\"4864\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>An overlook of Chisos Basin in the Big Bend National Park in West Texas, near the US-Mexico border.\n<p class=\"copyright\">John Moore/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>I will always listen to our border patrol and the experts. I was actually just in Del Rio [a border city in Val Verde County], where I met with the county sheriff and the mayor. They showed me exactly where fencing makes sense. However, there are also parts of the district like Big Bend [National Park], for example, where it would be a travesty to have a border wall running through that national treasure. We know that the vast majority of contraband comes through ports of entry, so I want to make sure that our agents have the resources to do their jobs and do so as safely as possible.</p><p><strong>If elected, what are some of your highest priorities for fighting the coronavirus?&#160;</strong></p><p>Over 800,000 Texans have gotten COVID-19, and now that's 800,000 folks that have a preexisting condition, if they didn't have one already. We know that more testing, contact tracing, and PPE [protective personal equipment] is critical to addressing this pandemic, along with ensuring that people have access to quality, affordable health care. <a href=\"https://www.expressnews.com/news/local/article/Bexar-leads-coronavirus-deaths-Texas-15517271.php#:~:text=Antonio's%20grim%20distinction-,The%20city%20has%20the%20highest%20COVID%2D19%20death,among%20Texas'%20major%20urban%20areas.&text=Bexar%20County%20has%20suffered%20more,to%20state%20and%20federal%20data.ata.\">San Antonio has the highest coronavirus-related fatality rate</a> of any major urban area in Texas. It's just critical that we get this pandemic under control so that we're not needlessly losing lives and needlessly losing small businesses and jobs.</p><p><strong>What are the top issues that you hear from rural Texans when campaigning?</strong></p><p>The issues that I hear about are in this order: Health care, health care, and health care. I'm committed to making sure that people have coverage by expanding Medicaid so that they can show up to these rural clinics and hospitals and get the preventative care that they need. It's critical that we invest in broadband, which helps address these inequities with telemedicine and tele-psychiatry. We also need more doctors. Even if every rural medical who student graduated from medical school and returned to a rural community, we're still only meeting 25% of our country's rural health care needs.</p><p><strong>How would you tackle the rising cost of college tuition?</strong></p><p>We're seeing a large number of students not reenrolling in community college here in San Antonio. That's a critical issue, because at two large universities in the city, Texas A&#38;M University-San Antonio and the University of Texas at San Antonio, almost half of the student body spends time at the community college here. If folks aren't reenrolling now because they don't have an internet connection or can't pay their tuition, that'll hurt us down the line. We have the resources as a country to make sure that we're preparing our young people for future economic opportunities, and that starts with investing in community colleges and supporting our colleges and universities.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/gina-ortiz-jones-texas-23rd-district-house-congressional-election-interview-2020-10'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a 15:26:07","updatedTime":"2020-10-31 15:26:07","title":"The best exercise balls","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-exercise-ball","description":"<ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>An exercise ball is a highly beneficial piece of home gym equipment that improves balance, flexibility, and core strength, and can be used in a variety of exercises and workouts.</strong></li><li><strong>The best exercise balls are made of durable materials, offer enough resistance and flexibility no matter the exercise, and don't require you to reinflate them between uses.&#160;</strong></li><li><strong>Our top pick, the <a href=\"http://amzn.to/2CXUJV9\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">TheraBand Exercise and Stability Ball</a>, features a thick-walled design and continues to hold air even in the event it's punctured.&#160;</strong><strong><br></strong></li></ul><p>Exercise balls might seem like a boring piece of workout equipment but their benefits far outweigh any perceived dullness. In fact, as a part of a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-home-gym\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">home gym setup</a>, an exercise ball has the ability to greatly improve one's core strength while also helping hone balance and flexibility.</p><p>Whether it accompanies <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/work-from-home-workout\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">a daily workout routine</a> or becomes the central focal point, an exercise ball can be an important part of anyone's plan to keep fit and healthy — they even make for a suitable office chair substitute.&#160;</p><h2>Exercise balls are an important part of any home gym</h2><p>Despite their inherent value, exercise balls aren't typically the first piece of gear you think of when piecing together a home gym. The truth is in the application, however, as&#160;they work for a host of exercises requiring flexible support. Even though an exercise ball is round, it gives you a base that's more solid than you might think and provides impressive stability.&#160;&#160;</p><p>The balls compress when weight is put on them to create a flatter, more stable edge. It won't be as stable as a normal chair but it's far more solid than you'd expect — which is what makes them great for everything from active seating to working out.</p><p>To find the best exercise balls worth using, I tested an assortment of models from brands like TheraBand, DynaPro, and Wacces. The goal was to find exercise balls that fit a variety of use cases, like being able to be taken on the road, or those that are constructed of a thicker material that increases its durability.</p><p>After spending the last several months using exercise balls as both my office chair and main workout partner, I narrowed the list down to my four favorites listed below. At the end of this guide, you'll find insight into <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-exercise-ball#exercise-ball-benefits-5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the benefits an exercise ball</a> provides as well as some important features to look for when shopping.</p><p>If you're a first time user or just want to improve some of your workouts, be sure to check out our list of <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/best-at-home-exercise-ball-routines\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">sample exercises</a> and various tips for using an exercise ball.&#160;</p><h2>Here are the best exercise balls:</h2><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Best exercise ball overall: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000U5W2RY/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_011018_best-exercise-balls-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B000U5W2RY&linkId=45794ec69f9b99aa0b10f8315752eca79f9b99aa0b10f8315752eca7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">TheraBand Exercise and Stability Ball</a> </strong></li><li><strong>Best portable exercise ball: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0187LW0A6/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_011018_best-exercise-balls-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B0187LW0A6&linkId=a3269263aefee9ef30f07cf373bde7e2aefee9ef30f07cf373bde7e2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">DynaPro Exercise Ball</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best durable exercise ball: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B010J1JTJ2/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_011018_best-exercise-balls-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B010J1JTJ2&linkId=ed02a1daa95b970d2956302dd9c6ebd2a95b970d2956302dd9c6ebd2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Live Infinitely Exercise Ball</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best budget exercise ball: <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FWacces-Exercise-Workout-Yoga-Ball-for-Yoga-Fitness-Pilates-Sculpting-with-Dual-Action-Pump-Gray-75-CM%2F1150808490849\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Wacces Fitness and Exercise Ball</a></strong></li></ul><p><em>Updated on 10/30/2020 by Rick Stella: Updated the section on why exercise balls are important in a home gym, checked the availability of each recommended exercise ball, and updated the prices and links where necessary.</em></p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe best overall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c2e7254e04d62466c437b22?format=jpeg\" alt=\"exercise ball\" height=\"1125\" width=\"1500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">TheraBand</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://goto.walmart.com/c/196318/565706/9383?veh=aff&#38;sourceid=imp_000011112222333344&#38;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FTheraBand-Exercise-and-Stability-Ball-Standard-Blue-75cm-Diameter%2F21108524%3F&#38;subid2=1594670678052atcmq94c6&#38;subId3=xid:fr1594670681737jgg\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">TheraBand Exercise and Stability Ball</a> holds air better than most exercise balls &#8212; even if it's punctured.</h3><p>One common complaint among exercise ball fans is the inability of the ball to hold air over time. As air ekes out of the ball, it loses its firmness and becomes difficult to use.&#160;Luckily, the <a href=\"https://goto.walmart.com/c/196318/565706/9383?veh=aff&#38;sourceid=imp_000011112222333344&#38;u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FTheraBand-Exercise-and-Stability-Ball-Standard-Blue-75cm-Diameter%2F21108524%3F&#38;subid2=1594670678052atcmq94c6&#38;subId3=xid:fr1594670681737jgg\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">TheraBand Exercise and Stability Ball</a> is one of the thickest-walled balls you can buy, and it holds air longer than most of the&#160;competition.</p><p>Even if it's punctured, the ball will deflate very slowly, allowing you to finish your exercise session. Because the Theraband Exercise Ball retains air so well, you won't have to reinflate it that often, which is a very good thing because&#160;this ball does take quite a bit of time to inflate in the first place.</p><p>The exercise ball is available in four sizes from 45 cm to 75 cm and it comes in a few colors.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Maintains its shape and holds air better than other exercise balls, includes a slow deflate technology if the ball is punctured, extremely firm, has a good surface for just the right amount of grip, offered in four sizes</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Takes a long time to inflate, no inflation pump included, only one color per size</p>\n\tThe best portable ball\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a5520183225de52008b551d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"exercise ball 6\" height=\"1000\" width=\"1333\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">DynaPro</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"http://amzn.to/2CNYIk3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">DynaPro Exercise Ball</a> is extremely durable and will hold its air pressure nicely, but it's also portable, thanks to its easy-to-carry hand pump.</h3><p>When you're looking for an exercise ball you can take with you anywhere, the <a href=\"http://amzn.to/2CNYIk3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">DynaPro Exercise Ball</a>&#160;is a good idea. It ships with a hand pump and inflates faster than many other balls, so you can be ready to use it within several minutes.</p><p>The ball is available in four sizes, ranging from 45 cm to 75 cm, and it features slight ribs around the circumference of the ball to ensure a steady grip. You can get it in a few fun colors, including pink, blue, silver, gray, and black.</p><p>Like many exercise balls, you can also use it for active seating in your office. Unlike most exercise balls, it's available in gray or black, which fits in better with an office setting than a brightly colored ball.&#160;</p><p>This is a tough, durable exercise ball, featuring a 2,000-pound burst rating. The ball also slowly deflates if it ever suffers a puncture, allowing you to finish your workout safely.</p><p>However, the ball cannot be inflated fully the first time you use it. You'll have to inflate it fully after it's had 2-3 days to stretch out.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Good price point, easy to fill while on the go because of an included hand pump, very durable material in the ball, prevents fast leaks when it suffers a puncture, available in four sizes and four different colors</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Cannot fully inflate the ball the first time you use it, firmness level of the ball seems below average</p>\n\tThe best durable ball\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a551e563225de9a0a8b53c1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"exercise ball 3\" height=\"963\" width=\"1284\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Live Infinitely</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"http://amzn.to/2CPlCau\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Live Infinitely Exercise Ball</a> receives high marks for its durability and ability to stand up to tough workouts.</h3><p>We don't expect anyone to routinely put 2,200 pounds of pressure on the <a href=\"http://amzn.to/2CPlCau\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Live Infinitely Exercise Ball</a>, but if you do, you can feel comfortable that this tough exercise ball can stand up to the pressure.</p><p>If you're looking for a tough exercise ball that's also really large, the Live Infinitely model is one of the few that comes in five sizes ranging from 55 cm to 95 cm. You&#160;can also choose between five colors, including blue, green, gray, purple, and silver.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Excellent price point, durable and tough exercise ball that can withstand 2,200 pounds of weight, available in a diameter as large as 95 cm, five color and five size options, includes a large library of online exercise guides</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>There is no 45 cm diameter size option in this model, difficult to fully inflate this ball</p>\n\tThe best budget ball\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a551f5c3225ded5018b54be?format=jpeg\" alt=\"exercise ball 5\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Wacces</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>If you want an affordable exercise ball that's also durable, the <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FWacces-Exercise-Workout-Yoga-Ball-for-Yoga-Fitness-Pilates-Sculpting-with-Dual-Action-Pump-Gray-75-CM%2F115080849\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Wacces Fitness and Exercise ball</a>&#160;is a great option.</h3><p>With some low priced exercise balls, you may feel leery about placing your full weight on them for fear of an exploding ball that leaves you crashing onto the floor. But the durability of the <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FWacces-Exercise-Workout-Yoga-Ball-for-Yoga-Fitness-Pilates-Sculpting-with-Dual-Action-Pump-Gray-75-CM%2F115080849\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Wacces Fitness and Exercise Ball</a> gives you the peace of mind you'll need to use this inexpensive ball to its fullest.</p><p>Even though it's less expensive than other options, this ball is still quite durable and has a good grippy surface. The biggest downside is that&#160;it doesn't support as much weight as more high-end exercise balls.</p><p>You can pick between three different sizes, ranging from 55 cm to 75 cm. It's also available in eight colors, including black, blue, gray, green, pink, purple, red, or yellow.</p><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Extremely low price point, good build quality versus similarly priced exercise balls, surface has just enough grip to prevent slippage, ribs around circumference of ball provide extra grip, offered in eight colors</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Only available in three sizes, difficult to fully inflate it first time you use it, doesn't hold air pressure as well as some models</p>\n\tExercise ball benefits\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a56455f25954cc20e8b4878?format=jpeg\" alt=\"woman exercise ball\" height=\"1200\" width=\"1600\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Shutterstock/Andrey_Popov</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Here are some of the primary benefits exercise balls provide:</p><ul style=\"list-style-type: disc; padding-left: 30px; font-family: Georgia,Times,sans-serif;\"><li><strong>Improved balance: </strong>You'll naturally strengthen your abs and back muscles while using an exercise ball because you must subtly shift your weight to remain balanced. As these muscles strengthen, your overall balance improves.</li><li><strong>Core strength: </strong>Athletes constantly talk about the importance of having core strength in the body, as it gives you great balance and coordination. Using an exercise ball increases core strength.</li><li><strong>Muscle work: </strong>Because you have to continually adjust your weight slightly to maintain your balance on the ball, you'll be using different muscle groups, which benefits your whole body.</li><li><strong>Rehabilitation and flexibility: </strong>You'll stretch muscles and joints while moving around. Physical therapists sometimes assign a set of exercises using an exercise ball for people to follow as part of rehabilitating a specific joint or muscle group to gain more range of motion.</li><li><strong>Specific exercises: </strong>If you enjoy exercises like Pilates or yoga, you'll gain some additional benefits by <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/best-at-home-exercise-ball-routines\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">incorporating an exercise ball into the routine</a>.</li><li><strong>Spinal support: </strong>The way the body and exercise ball interact relieves pressure on the spine when you are sitting on the ball. To use the ball properly, you will need good posture, which also will help your spine and will alleviate back pain.</li></ul><h3>Exercise ball features</h3><p>Yes, an exercise ball is a simple, large round ball that looks like every other exercise ball at first glance. There are still several key differences you can pay attention to when looking to find the right exercise ball to meet your needs.</p><ul style=\"list-style-type: disc; padding-left: 30px; font-family: Georgia,Times,sans-serif;\"><li><strong>Adding air: </strong>Some exercise balls include an air pump, however, most of these pumps work very slowly. If you want a faster option, you should be able to use almost any type of pump to inflate your exercise ball, such as an air mattress pump, a bicycle tire pump, or even an air compressor. To determine when the ball is properly filled with air, measure its diameter.</li><li><strong>Extras: </strong>Depending on the model of exercise ball you pick, you may find the ball ships with an air pump, exercise bands, a stability ring, stability legs, a measuring tape, an exercise tip guide, or handles built into the ball.&#160;</li><li><strong>Size: </strong>The size of a stability ball is determined by its diameter. Common sizes of exercise balls range from 45 cm to 85 cm in 10 cm intervals. (Ten centimeters is roughly 4 inches.) People shorter than 5 feet will have the best results with sitting on a 45 cm ball, 6-feet-tall people will want a 65 cm ball, and those 6-foot-8 and taller will want an 85 cm ball.&#160;</li><li><strong>Supported weight: </strong>Exercise balls should offer supported weight limits for static weight and body weight. Static weight refers to the weight the ball supports without bursting when the user is not moving. Bodyweight refers to the weight it can support when the user is exercising. High-end balls may support static weight limits of 2,200 pounds and body weights of 500 pounds. A stability ball placed under too much weight or stress could burst.</li></ul>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a
