They'll also get a credit for either $15 or $30 to use on full bottles.&#160;</p>\n\tA smart frame that allows them to look through photos\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ec6b4652618b959337a3476?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Smart Frame\" height=\"867\" width=\"1156\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">The Grommet</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=38396&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thegrommet.com%2Fproducts%2Faura-smart-connected-picture-frame%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Smart Connected Picture Frame, available at The Grommet, $299</a></h3><p>If they're tech-savvy, get them a smart picture frame that cycles through family photos from their digital albums or phone. You can also use a built-in family sharing feature to have other people send pictures directly to their frame.</p>\n\tA soothing bubble bath from a well-loved brand\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cbe0032b14bf402cd27e91e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"lavande shampoo\" height=\"287\" width=\"382\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://amzn.to/2QeJ4sC\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">L'Occitane Relaxing &#38; Foaming Lavender Bubble Bath, available at Amazon, $39</a></h3><p>This cult-favorite lavender-scented bubble bath from L'Occitane is a great way to relax, and it takes a while to get through.&#160;</p>\n\tA new gadget that lets them preserve wine for years by never technically uncorking it\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c1ab50a3224ed0e00237e49?format=jpeg\" alt=\"CORAVIN Two Lifestyle Shot 2 St Vincents Cave\" height=\"735\" width=\"980\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Coravin</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=13867&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bloomingdales.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2Fcoravin-model-two-wine-system%3FID%3D1771162\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">Coravin Model Two Wine Preservation System, available at Bloomingdale's, $299.99</a></h3><p>Coravin allows you to pour a glass of wine without ever uncorking the bottle, so you don't have to worry about oxidation ruining the wine. If they're opening it just for a glass, their wine will stay preserved over weeks, months, and years if they like. It also gives them greater freedom; There's no need to conserve by sharing a bottle, so they can pick their own favorite every time.&#160;</p>\n\tAn Echo Dot that's easy to use and extremely helpful\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9b060c69331a0011bc61e7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Gifts for men Echo Dot\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://amzn.to/2QG8LBE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">3rd Generation Echo Dot, available at Amazon, $18.99</a></h3><p>If your grandparents aren't extremely techy, the Echo Dot is an especially good starter gift. It maximizes convenience, requires little interaction after setup, and takes up minimal space. They can easily ask Alexa for recipes, the weather, the news, and to control things like the lights. You could also grab a few accompanying <a href=\"https://amzn.to/2EjJnvF\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">smart bulbs</a> if they either hate getting up to turn them off, or if their knees tend to bother them. Stick around to set it up, and show them a few of the coolest features.</p><p><em>*This product is currently unavailable to ship until December 2, 2020, but it is still available to purchase.</em></p>\n\tFrame one of your favorite memories with them.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cb9f0c99dd2f337c744c9e9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"46525934_1624387227705114_6072209481591160832_o\" height=\"1367\" width=\"1823\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Framebridge</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGR0hOTEJGSEhLR01CR0VHTEVL?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.framebridge.com%2Fgifts&#38;sid=biip_120618_gifts-grandparents\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Framed Photo, from $39</a><br /><br /><a href=\"https://www.pntrs.com/t/TUJGR0hOTEJGSEhLR01CR0VHTEVL?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.framebridge.com%2Flp%2Fgift-cards&#38;sid=biip_120618_gifts-grandparents\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Framebridge Gift Card, from $25</a></h3><p>Framebridge makes custom framing for not-custom-framing prices. You can print or paint something on your own and have it framed for your grandparents, and&#160;<a href=\"https://www.pjatr.com/t/TUJGR0hOTEJGSEhLR01CR0VHTEVL?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.framebridge.com%2Flp%2Fdesign-services&#38;sid=biip_120618_gifts-grandparents\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">you can take advantage of the team of designers</a>&#160;for help deciding what frame to get. If you want to give them total control, you can gift a gift card and help them with the process if needed.</p>\n\tA comfortable weighted blanket for better rest\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cbe01c9745653789f1d1a18?format=jpeg\" alt=\"weighted blanket\" height=\"276\" width=\"368\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://amzn.to/2SbsEy3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Quilty Premium Adult Weighted Blanket with Removable Cover, available at Amazon, $129.99</a></h3><p>Give your grandparents better rest for the holidays with a cult-favorite weighted blanket with a removable cover. By mimicking DPTS (deep pressure touch stimulation), weighted blankets help us calm down, fall asleep faster, stay asleep better and for longer, and feel more rested when we wake up.&#160;</p><p>&#160;</p>\n\tA custom painting of their furry best friend\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c099df31486fd0acc47cab7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"5bd383c98d2fbe47ca2b0bf7 480 324\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Uncommon Goods</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"http://uncommongoods.sjv.io/c/196318/483884/8444?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.uncommongoods.com%2Fproduct%2Fcustom-painterly-pet-portraits\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Custom Painterly Pet Portraits, available at Uncommon Goods, from $180</a></h3><p>Make sure this is their decor style before committing to it, but a portrait of their pet is probably one of the sweetest and most thoughtful gestures. It's unique, handmade, and pays homage to the little fur-mop that loves lounging in an adjacent sun patch on the couch every day.</p>\n\tA good-looking, cleverly designed container for artisan cheeses\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cbe0124745653786278a1c8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"6cb33f2e f410 4c70 8e8a 0752cb1321c9 2018 0706_capabunga_cheese vault_1x1_ty mecham_001 1\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Food52</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/3861930/type/dlg/https://food52.com/shop/products/4396-cheese-vault\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cheese Vault, available at Food52, from $34</a></h3><p>You can't go wrong with a cute, handy place for storing artisan cheese that looks far nicer than plastic wrap. Grab some tasty options to start them off with, too.&#160;</p>\n\tA funny ode to the festive family moments we all know and love\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c6bdb69331a0011bc6751?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Gifts for grandparents Senior Moments\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Senior-Moments-Christmas-Tim-Whyatt/dp/178741132X/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biip_120618_gifts-grandparents-20&#38;linkId=43cbda80a06fb84070b1ca1e53aa38e0&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Senior Moments: Christmas, available at Amazon, $9.95</a></h3><p>If your grandparents love a good joke, this funny seasonal book illustrates festive family moments from the holidays. Just flip through the first few sample pages to make sure it matches their humor before ordering en masse.&#160;</p>\n\tA movie night with you, planned out by you\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f983ed3861cb70019936a7d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Last minute gifts Fandango\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Fandango/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/3861930/type/dlg/https://www.fandango.com/fandango-gift-cards\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Fandango Gift Card, available at Fandango, from $15</a></h3><p>Once it's safe to do so, take them to a movie &#8212; spare no expense on movie popcorn, an unnecessarily huge soft drink, and a candy that is usually gone by the close of previews. Grab a gift card and put it in a nice Etsy card, and set a date for the next blockbuster. Baby Balm\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Pipette Baby Balm has proven to be an effective moisturizer for my toddler.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Pipette Baby</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Pipette-Renewable-Plant-Derived-Squalane-2-Ounce/dp/B07VW3HQ6T/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biipf_010620_pipettes-baby-balm-review-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=fe9f1918a0d4e23eaac54eb03429374c&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Pipette Baby Balm</a>&#160;is the most effective and nonirritating lotion alternative I've found that diminishes my daughter's eczema.</strong></li><li><strong>Launched in September 2019, Pipette makes bath and moisturizing products for mom and baby. </strong></li><li><strong>Their formulas are hypoallergenic and Environmental Working Group (EWG) Verified. </strong></li><li><strong>I've found that this balm is an excellent option for those who are sensitive to perfumed baby lotions or need a quality baby moisturizer suitable for fall and winter.</strong></li></ul><bi-shortcode id=\"table-of-contents\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents</bi-shortcode><div id=\"ProductCard_5e13693d855cc246d3547b56\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e13693d855cc246d3547b56&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>I've been on the hunt for an effective environmentally friendly, unscented baby moisturizer since I was pregnant.&#160;</p><p>That was four years ago.</p><p>Yeah, it's been a journey. So you'll understand why a seemingly simple tub of <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Pipette-Renewable-Plant-Derived-Squalane-2-Ounce/dp/B07VW3HQ6T/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biipf_010620_pipettes-baby-balm-review-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=fe9f1918a0d4e23eaac54eb03429374c&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Pipette Baby Balm</a> has me as hyped up as a kid at \"Baby Shark Live.\"&#160;</p><p>Two weeks and 22 uses since purchase, I think I may finally be able to toss out the graveyard of half-used lotions and balms taking up space in my bathroom cabinet.</p><p>I tried <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Pipette-Renewable-Plant-Derived-Squalane-2-Ounce/dp/B07VW3HQ6T/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biipf_010620_pipettes-baby-balm-review-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=fe9f1918a0d4e23eaac54eb03429374c&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Pipette</a> on a lark thanks to a 20% off coupon. The brand, which launched in September 2019, makes moisturizers and bath products for babies and moms.</p><p>Although my daughter is a toddler now, I still gravitate toward baby products because they tend to have fewer ingredients and lighter scents. It's also a consideration for my work as a postpartum doula. New families are <em>always </em>in need of reliable, baby-safe products that aren't a waste of money.</p><h2>What makes Pipette stand out?</h2><p>While cruelty-free, vegan, and unscented were the initial draw for me, I will admit that I am a sucker for minimalist packaging, and Pipette's sedate, slightly retro, mint-and-navy blue combo definitely caught my eye.</p><p>The design is as clean and simple as its ingredients. The packaging is recyclable, and according to the brand's website, renewable plastics are used \"whenever possible.\" Although that iffy language is underwhelming, the company does not test on animals and features only plant-derived ingredients.</p><p>On top of that, all of their products carry the Environmental Working Group's <a href=\"https://www.ewg.org/ewgverified/about-the-mark.php\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">EWG Verified</a> guarantee that they do not contain potentially harmful ingredients.</p><h2>Ingredients</h2><p>When it comes to babies, less is definitely more. A main selling point of this brand is that it does not contain fillers or synthetics.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Pipette-Renewable-Plant-Derived-Squalane-2-Ounce/dp/B07VW3HQ6T/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biipf_010620_pipettes-baby-balm-review-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=fe9f1918a0d4e23eaac54eb03429374c&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Pipette</a> relies on sugarcane-derived \"squalane,\" which is intended to mimic our body's own squalene (with an \"e\"), a skin-moisturizing lipid we naturally produce. To that, it adds plant-derived fatty acids, berry wax, a few fruit/plant-based binders and moisturizers, and vitamin E.&#160;</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Pipette-Renewable-Plant-Derived-Squalane-2-Ounce/dp/B07VW3HQ6T/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biipf_010620_pipettes-baby-balm-review-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=fe9f1918a0d4e23eaac54eb03429374c&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e1356e2855cc23934667495?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Pipette Baby Balm2\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>I apply a thin coat of the balm to my daughter&#39;s face post-bath, as well as the crooks of her elbows and several other targeted spots.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Mandy Major/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><p>What it does <em>not</em> contain may be more newsworthy: no petrolatum, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, oxybenzone, talc, polyethylene glycol, formaldehyde, or retinyl palmitate. Although these ingredients are commonly found in <a href=\"https://www.ewg.org/skindeep\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">beauty and bath products</a>, they are arguably irritants, potential carcinogens, allergens, and/or hormone disruptors.</p><h2>Putting the Baby Balm to the test</h2><p>Once fall hits, dryness is a given. And as the chilly New England temperatures drop further, my household is up against something even worse: eczema. It manifests as small red and raised patches that drive my daughter crazy with itching. Unrefined extra-virgin coconut oil has been my fallback since she was an infant, but it is messy and takes time to absorb.</p><p>Other nonsynthetic products didn't work for us, for various combinations of lackluster moisture, allergenic ingredients, or not-quite-right scents. Everyone for Everybody is a terrific synthetic-free brand, but it's extremely lightweight. I even plunked down $35 to try a jar of Pommade Divine Nature's Remedy Balm, but its medicinal scent and greasy after-life doomed it to the back of the drawer almost instantly.</p><p>That brings us to <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Pipette-Renewable-Plant-Derived-Squalane-2-Ounce/dp/B07VW3HQ6T/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biipf_010620_pipettes-baby-balm-review-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=fe9f1918a0d4e23eaac54eb03429374c&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Pipette</a>. I decided to test the balm by finger-painting a thin coat on my daughter's face post-bath, as well as the crooks of her elbows and several other targeted spots. Once our mornings hit below freezing, I repeated a quick swipe on her cheeks before heading out to daycare. In three days, her cheeks went from a patchwork of bright red blotches to a few faint rosy marks. Nothing else has done that as fast or as effectively.</p><h2>The bottom line</h2><p>So, should you buy it? Yes. Particularly if you are interested in vegan products without synthetic ingredients, are sensitive to perfumed baby lotions, or need a quality baby moisturizer suitable for fall and winter.</p><p>There are literally thousands of options there. I am recommending this as a replacement for baby's daily lotion and as a spot fix for patches of extra-dry skin. Depending on your needs, other products may be better for your baby. If cradle cap is a concern, I recommend unrefined extra virgin coconut oil. If diaper rash is cropping up, there is nothing better than <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0009RF8G0/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipf_010620_pipettes-baby-balm-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B0009RF8G0&linkId=610aa9304361f3aa48cfc98690b90a724361f3aa48cfc98690b90a72\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Boudreaux's Butt Paste</a> in my experience.</p><p>If you love fragrant \"baby-smelling\" things, this probably won't hit the mark for you. Though it's marketed as \"unscented,\" the balm smells a bit like linseed oil. Or, if you ask my toddler, it \"smells like unicorn syrup!!!\"</p><p>I've read some reviews that say the balm felt greasy or didn't absorb. That was not my experience. In fact, I felt it was the opposite. At $13 for 2 ounces, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Pipette-Renewable-Plant-Derived-Squalane-2-Ounce/dp/B07VW3HQ6T/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biipf_010620_pipettes-baby-balm-review-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=fe9f1918a0d4e23eaac54eb03429374c&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Pipette</a> is pricier than many store-bought options. However, it's less expensive than upscale balms and lotions targeting consumers who want&#160;products free of synthetics and potentially harmful ingredients.</p><p>You can purchase Pipette Baby Balm on its own or as part of a bundled gift pack. I purchased the <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.buybuybaby.com/store/product/pipette-2-oz-baby-balm/5411729?skuId=20636456&mrkgcl=611&mrkgadid=3015288844&enginename=google&mcid=PS_googlepla_nonbrand_health_online&product_id=20636456&product_channel=online&adtype=pla&adpos=&creative=263213775346&device=c&matchtype=&network=g&utm_campaignid=71700000040060880&utm_adgroupid=58700004311865896&targetid=92700036057908035&gclid=EAIaIQobChMI3dGC1e_T6AIVBp6fCh2bYwXnEAsYBSABEgKvp_D_BwE&gclsrc=aw.dsIQobChMI3dGC1e_T6AIVBp6fCh2bYwXnEAsYBSABEgKvp_D_BwE&#38;gclsrc=aw.ds\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">Moisturizing Bath Set</a> ($30). (The Baby Lotion is great so far, but its scent is more medicinal than the Balm).</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Plant-derived ingredients; no perfumes or synthetic fragrance; moisturizing, absorbent, and non-greasy</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>More expensive than mainstream store-bought alternatives</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5e13693d855cc246d3547b56\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e13693d855cc246d3547b56&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\"
